title: Cacophony Of Love
description: Tyra thought her life was perfect. She had married her childhood sweetheart, Patrick, when she got pregnant with their son who was now three. They had struggled financially, but these hard times were finally over. With Patrick’s new job, they could finally relax and enjoy life. However, all that came to a screeching halt when on the night of Patrick’s birthday, he threw her out of their bedroom accusing her of being a…
author: MARIO CHATEAU
